hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) (p.b.u.h) while he was on the pulpit speaking about charity, to abstain from asking others for some financial help and about begging others, saying, "The upper hand is better than the lower hand. The upper hand is that of the giver and the lower (hand) is that of the beggar

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ صَدَقَةَ إِلاَّ عَنْ ظَهْرِ غِنًى
chapter.eng-name: The wealthy only are required to give in charity
